commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I wonder how everyone in Î¼'s is doing. I can't wait to see them.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I know! While I'm at it, I should bring them even more snacks! That would make them even happier.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: If I'm not mistaken, there should be a mall around here somewhere. I can buy something there.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Wow! Look, Chika! This brooch is so cute! It's a little pink flower!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That really is cute! Oh, there's a mikan orange-colored one, too. Let's both buy one, so we can match!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yeah! *Giggle* Yay, matching!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This hair clip is really cute, too. Gosh, it's so hard to decide on anything when there's so much cute stuff everywhere. Tokyo never disappoints!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: It's so much fun that it's easy to lose track of time, isn't it? Speaking of which, are we still doing okay on time?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Umm, yup! We still have time. Huh?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey, Ruby, is that Emma walking over there?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh hey, it is. She's wearing her school uniform. Do you think she's on her way home from school?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It looks like she's alone. Let's follow her! I wanna know what she gets up to after school!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh, wait, Chika! The brooch! Don't run off with it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Hmm, what should I choose? Cookies? Pound cake? Chocolates? These rice crackers look really tasty, too!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: It looks like she's picking out snacks. Is that what she came here to buy?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Her whole basket is full, though. Do you really think she's planning on eating all that alone?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: That's true... Oh, I bet she's probably going to share it with the other Nijigasaki girls, like whenever they take a break from practice or something.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That makes sense! I'm sure they'll be hungry after all that dancing. She really should've brought someone else with her if she's buying that much, though...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* I bought so many things! Cookies, pound cake, candy, and sweet potato tarts! I hope this makes the Î¼'s girls even happier.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Ch-Chika! D-Did she just say sweet potato tarts?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: She did. I wonder if she'll be okay. Can she really carry that giant bag all the way back to Nijigasaki?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Sweet potato tarts! I'm so jealous. I want some!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Maybe I'll buy some, too. Oh, I can get some from the sweets shop Emma was just at.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I bet the sweet potato tarts sold in Tokyo shops are really fancy and yummy!

commands.speaker: Chika, Ruby
commands.line: Chika: Agh! Ruby: Eeek!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That scared me! Did Emma see us?!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I-It's okay. Wait a second, why are we even sneaking around like this in the first place?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yes, hello? Uh-huh... Yeah... Oh, really?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Chika, Emma is leaving.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Got it, thanks. Okay!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Let's chase after her, Ruby!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Huh? Why?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* I just thought of something fun.
